creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game!
Further down in the section "Improvements compared to the first version" you will find all the changes compared to the first version.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when they had to play it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for children and adults.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or sum up 10. For example 7 and 3, 9 and 1 or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. By doing this you can skip crossed out numbers.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you must press "Check". With "Check" all remaining numbers are written behind all already existing numbers.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there is no more possibility
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Statistics: The playing time and statistics for the current playing field can be viewed
- Automatic save/load
- Also playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- It is possible to cross out single numbers
- It is now also possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- It is now possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can change numbers to icons now
- Improved instruction
- Improved color picker
- Better performance

Other
Depending on how the game is played and how you strike through number by number, digit by digit, the game may take longer or less. But you can cross out all numbers in almost all cases, you might need some patience (or use a boost).

If you want an introduction to the game (there still version 1) from a user's point of view, I can recommend this website: http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/
In addition to an introduction, there is also a very elaborate strategy.

Try this different number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Also this version of the Numbers Game - Numberama is completely ad-free and does not use critical permissions. In addition, it takes up little memory space. It is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, other number puzzles or crossword puzzles and therefore a patience and casual game for everyone. Try to cross out all numbers in the best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email. I would also appreciate help for improving the english translation.

Lars
descriptionShort: Try to cross out all numbers. The new improved version of Numbers Game! 🔢

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Change: Some internal refactorings and updating of packages to reduce bugs and improve performance
- Change: If you click a single number before clicking help, help starts searching for combinations at that number (combinations before that number will be ignored)
- Change: Digit is unclicked when you click on an empty space
- Feature: Added possibility that you can restart a game with the same numbers (available after the next restart of a game)

descriptionShort: Try to cross out all numbers. The new improved version of Numbers Game! 🔢

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: Possibility to replay an already solved level. It is only possible to replay one level at a time. If you want to replay another level you are asked to overwrite the other one.
- Feature: Long click on the help to find out whether combinations are still possible, but not which ones. The countdown is 1/4 of normal help.
- Change: If you click a single number before clicking help, help starts searching for combinations at that number (combinations before that number will be ignored)

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game!
Further down in the section "Improvements compared to the first version" you will find all the changes compared to the first version.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when you might have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for children and adults.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to 10. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved color picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same). As well as an introduction, there is also a very elaborate strategy.

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game - Numberama 2 is completely ad-free and it takes up little memory space. It is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars
descriptionShort: Try to cross out all numbers. The new improved version of Numbers Game! 🔢

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: Possibility to replay an already solved level. It is only possible to replay one level at a time. If you want to replay another level you are asked to overwrite the other one.
- Feature: Long click on the help to find out whether combinations are still possible, but not which ones. The countdown is 1/4 of normal help.
- Change: If you click a single number before clicking help, help starts searching for combinations at that number (combinations before that number will be ignored)

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:

In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to 10. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty

- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved color picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same). As well as an introduction, there is also a very elaborate strategy.

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game - Numberama 2 is completely ad-free and it takes up little memory space. It is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game!
Further down in the section "Improvements compared to the first version" you will find all the changes compared to the first version.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when you might have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for children and adults.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to 10. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved color picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same). As well as an introduction, there is also a very elaborate strategy.

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game - Numberama 2 is completely ad-free and it takes up little memory space. It is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars
descriptionShort: Try to cross out all numbers. The new improved version of Numbers Game! 🔢

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: Possibility to replay an already solved level. It is only possible to replay one level at a time. If you want to replay another level you are asked to overwrite the other one.
- Feature: Long click on the help to find out whether combinations are still possible, but not which ones. The countdown is 1/4 of normal help.
- Change: If you click a single number before clicking help, help starts searching for combinations at that number (combinations before that number will be ignored)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: Added setting to confirm every check to prevent misclicks

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game!
Further down in the section "Improvements compared to the first version" you will find all the changes compared to the first version.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when you might have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for children and adults.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to 10. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game - Numberama 2 is completely ad-free and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, Seeds, or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars

- Feature: Long click on the help to find out whether combinations are still possible, but not which ones. The countdown is 1/4 of normal help.

In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to 10. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game - Numberama 2 is completely ad-free and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, Seeds, or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars
descriptionShort: Try to cross out all numbers. The new improved version of Numbers Game! 🔢

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: Added new language: russian
- Feature: You can now change the number size in the settings
- Fix: Fix bug at check confirmation
- Feature: Added setting to confirm every check to prevent misclicks
- Feature: Possibility to replay an already solved level. It is only possible to replay one level at a time. If you want to replay another level you are asked to overwrite the other one.

- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game - Numberama 2 is completely ad-free and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, Seeds, or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars
descriptionShort: Try to cross out all numbers. The new improved version of Numbers Game! 🔢

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: You can now set the colors in the settings with the Hex-Code
- Feature: Added new language: russian
- Feature: You can now change the number size in the settings
- Fix: Fix bug at check confirmation
- Feature: Added setting to confirm every check to prevent misclicks
- Feature: Possibility to replay an already solved level. It is only possible to replay one level at a time. If you want to replay another level you are asked to overwrite the other one.

The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version 💪
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free, you won't find any ads, and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, 10 Seeds, Numberzilla or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer and brain game ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2 (No Ads)

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game! The classic time killer with well-known rules enriched with many new features.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when you might have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to ten. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
📈 Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
⏰ Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
🔨 Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Also known as Take Ten, 10 Seeds, Numberzilla or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer and brain game ever!

For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars

- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free, you won't find any ads, and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, 10 Seeds, Numberzilla or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer and brain game ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game! The classic time killer with well-known rules enriched with many new features.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when you might have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to ten. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free, you won't find any ads, and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, 10 Seeds, Numberzilla or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers or puzzle games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer and brain game ever!

For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Try out the new and improved version of Numbers Game! The classic time killer with well-known rules enriched with many new features.

Some of you may still know the Numbers Game from school or university when you might have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to ten. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Improvements compared to the first version
- Level Mode!
- Mode Builder Mode!
- Boosts: Shuffle all numbers or remove some/all crossed out numbers
- Possible to cross out single numbers
- Possible to undo a move after deleting a line
- Possible to automatically scroll to the combination found by "Help"
- You can use icons rather than numbers
- Improved instruction
- Improved colour picker
- Better performance

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free, you won't find any ads, and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, 10 Seeds, Numberzilla or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known numbers or puzzle games like Sudoku, 2048, other number puzzles, or crossword puzzles - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer and brain game ever!

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

Lars

Many of you know the Numbers Game from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for adults and children.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to ten. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.
Lars

Try this unique number puzzle now and try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free, you won't find any ads, and it takes up little memory space. Also known as Take Ten, 10 Seeds, 1-19, Doodle, Numberzilla or Numbers it is a great alternative to the well-known word or number puzzle games like Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, other number puzzles, crossword puzzles or word puzzle games - a patience game for everyone. The best time killer and brain game ever!

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2 | The Number Puzzle

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
This is the new and improved version of Numbers Game! The classic time killer with well-known rules enriched with many new features.

Many of you know the Numbers Game from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to ten. For example, 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes one game can take hours. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I can recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is for version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the game please send me an email.

The best time killer and brain game ever!

title: Numbers Game - Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:

In this logic game you have to cross out all the numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are equal, or add up to ten. For example you can match numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs that match
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

Many of you know this Number Match Game from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

In this logic game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can match numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues. One big difference to all the Number block merge games is, that the two numbers are not merged creating a new number but crossed out.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs that match
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colors or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes a game can take hours to clear the board. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the number game please send me an email.

Try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free except that you have the opportunity to watch ads to get some coins as reward, and it takes up little memory space. This game has many names like Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla or Match Numbers and it is a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games - a patience game for everyone. A real time killer and good brain game!
descriptionShort: Find pairs and cross numbers. The classic and addictive number match puzzle 2.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Feature: You can now play with special numbers in "Mode builder" mode. Explanations of special numbers available at the "?" in the main menu
- Feature: Added the setting to show if no more combination is possible in level mode
- Feature: Added possibility to get coins by watching an ad in the shop

- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes a game can take hours to clear the board. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the number game please send me an email.

Try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free except that you have the opportunity to watch ads to get some coins as reward, and it takes up little memory space. title: Number Match Game Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Numbers Game 2 is the new and improved version of the addictive puzzle game! The classic time killer and number match game with simple rules enriched with many new features.

Many of you know this Number Match Game from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can match numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues. One big difference to all the Number block merge games is, that the two numbers are not merged creating a new number but crossed out.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs that match
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes a game can take hours to clear the board. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the number game please send me an email.

title: Number Match Game Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Numbers Game 2 is the new and improved version of the addictive puzzle game! The classic time killer and number match game with simple rules enriched with many new features.

Many of you know this Number Match Game from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can match numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues. One big difference to all the Number block merge games is, that the two numbers are not merged creating a new number but crossed out.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs that match
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes a game can take hours to clear the board. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the number game please send me an email.

Try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free except that you have the opportunity to watch ads to get some coins as reward, and it takes up little memory space. This game has many names like Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla or Match Numbers and it is a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games - a patience game for everyone. A real time killer and good brain game!

- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs that match
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games (the amount depends on the mode) or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes a game can take hours to clear the board. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or improving the number game please send me an email.

Try to cross out all the numbers! Numbers Game Numberama 2 is completely ad-free except that you have the opportunity to watch ads to get some coins as reward, and it takes up little memory space. This game has many names like Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla or Match Numbers and it is a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games - a patience game for everyone. A real time killer and good brain game!

title: Number Match Game Numberama 2

creator: Lars Feßen
descriptionHtml:
Numbers Game 2 is the new and improved version of the addictive puzzle game! The classic time killer and number match game with simple rules enriched with many new features.

Many of you know this Number Match Game from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Numbers Game - Numberama 2" is also available as an app for your smartphone. A classic brain game for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this logic game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be crossed out, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can match numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two numbers have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out numbers between them.
If you cannot or do not want to cross out any more numbers and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the game continues. One big difference to all the Number block merge games is, that the two numbers are not merged creating a new number but crossed out.

Features
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the game
- Mode Builder: Create your own mode (1-18, 1-19 or random)

In each mode there are the following features:
- "Undo": Undo the last move (for 3 coins each you can also undo several moves in a row)
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number pairs that match
- "Cross": For 5 coins you can strike through any single number
- "Restart": Start the game from the beginning or start a new game
- "Boosts - Shuffle": For 15 coins you can shuffle all the numbers on the board
- "Boosts - Clear 30%": For 15 coins you can remove 30% of all crossed out numbers
- "Boosts - Clear all": For 25 coins you can remove ALL crossed out numbers
- "Statistics": The playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number at top/bottom
- Diagonal combinations in mode builder
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards and saved games

What are these coins?
The coins are an app-internal currency. With these you can use some of the features mentioned above. Coins can be obtained by solving games or by buying them in the shop. You can find the shop in the main menu.

Other
Some modes can be very difficult, and the time to complete the game depends on how you choose the pairs to cross out. Sometimes a game can take hours to clear the board. But you can cross out all the numbers in almost all cases, but you might need some patience (or use a Boost).

If you want an introduction to the game from a skilled user's point of view, I recommend http://www.rootbeer.co.nz/introduction-to-numbers-game-numberama/ (note that this is version 1, but the gameplay is the same).

Support
For help with translations or feedback please send me an email.

A real time killer and good brain game!

Number Match Game Numberama 2
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the number games
- Mode Builder: Create your own numbers game (1-18, 1-19, or choose from ten digits randomly)

Use all of this in any of your number match games:
- "Undo": Undo the last move
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number blocks that match
- "Cross": Strike through any single number
- "Statistics": Playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number blocks at top/bottom
- Diagonal numbers combinations in mode builder
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customizable number board (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want, you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards, achievements and saved games

Pair Matching Numbers Puzzle
Use your number games skills to find the matching pair combinations and solve the free logic puzzle. When the levels get difficult, you can also use special boosts to make the matching games even more interesting:
- Shuffle all the numbers on the numbers board
- Clear 30% of all crossed out numbers
- Clear all crossed out numbers on the number board

Are you looking for a number game that will save you from boredom? How about playing a logic block puzzle that will help you sharpen your number and matching games skills? With this pair matching number games app, you can experience a relaxing and addictive number puzzle with simple rules. Find and merge matching numbers that are the same or add up to ten on the number board. Switch between different puzzle modes and use new special features. Use your number match and block puzzle skills to merge and strike through all number blocks and clear the board. It is simple and addictive and therefore a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like math Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games. It is a real time killer and good brain game.

Solve number matching games, win rewards, and become a master in the free number match puzzle. Scan the board as carefully as you can and customize the number blocks according to your preferences. You can change colours and numbers as you want. This numbers game is also known as Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla, 1010, Number match or Merge Numbers. Play matching games as long as you like and change the mode whenever you want.

Support
For help with translations, please send me an email.

In this numbers game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be merged, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can combine numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two digits have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the number board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out number blocks between them.
If you cannot or do not want to merge numbers, and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the numbers game continues.

Number Match Game Numberama 2
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the number games
- Mode Builder: Create your own numbers game (1-18, 1-19, or choose from ten digits randomly)

Use all of this in any of your number match games:
- "Undo": Undo the last move
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number blocks that match
- "Cross": Strike through any single number
- "Statistics": Playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number blocks at top/bottom
- Diagonal numbers combinations in mode builder
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customisable number board (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want, you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards, achievements and saved games

Pair Matching Numbers Puzzle
Use your number games skills to find the matching pair combinations and solve the free logic puzzle. When the levels get difficult, you can also use special boosts to make the matching games even more interesting:
- Shuffle all the numbers on the numbers board
- Clear 30% of all crossed out numbers
- Clear all crossed out numbers on the number board

Are you looking for a number game that will save you from boredom? How about playing a logic block puzzle that will help you sharpen your number and matching games skills? With this pair matching number games app, you can experience a relaxing and addictive number puzzle with simple rules. Find and merge matching numbers that are the same or add up to ten on the number board. Switch between different puzzle modes and use new special features. Use your number match and block puzzle skills to merge and strike through all number blocks and clear the board. It is simple and addictive and therefore a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like math Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games. It is a real time killer and good brain game.

Solve number matching games, win rewards, and become a master in the free number match puzzle. Scan the board as carefully as you can and customise the number blocks according to your preferences. You can change colours and numbers as you want. This numbers game is also known as Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla, 1010, Number match or Merge Numbers. Play matching games as long as you like and change the mode whenever you want.

Support
For help with translations, please send me an email.
