Numbers Game 2 is the new and improved version of the addictive logic puzzle game! The classic time killer and number match game with simple rules, enriched with many new features.

Many of you know this Number Match logic riddle from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Number Match Game Numberama 2" is also available for your smartphone. Matching brain games & logic puzzles for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this numbers game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be merged, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can combine numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two digits have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the number board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out number blocks between them.
If you cannot or do not want to merge numbers, and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the numbers game continues.

Number Match Game Numberama 2
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the number games
- Mode Builder: Create your own numbers game (1-18, 1-19, or choose from ten digits randomly)

Use all of this in any of your number match games:
- "Undo": Undo the last move
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number blocks that match
- "Cross": Strike through any single number
- "Statistics": Playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number blocks at top/bottom
- Diagonal numbers combinations in mode builder
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customisable number board (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want, you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards, achievements and saved games

Pair Matching Numbers Puzzle
Use your number games skills to find the matching pair combinations and solve the free logic puzzle. When the levels get difficult, you can also use special boosts to make the matching games even more interesting:
- Shuffle all the numbers on the numbers board
- Clear 30% of all crossed out numbers
- Clear all crossed out numbers on the number board

Are you looking for a number game that will save you from boredom? How about playing a logic block puzzle that will help you sharpen your number and matching games skills? With this pair matching number games app, you can experience a relaxing and addictive number puzzle with simple rules. Find and merge matching numbers that are the same or add up to ten on the number board. Switch between different puzzle modes and use new special features. Use your number match and block puzzle skills to merge and strike through all number blocks and clear the board. It is simple and addictive and therefore a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like math Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games. It is a real time killer and good brain game.

Solve number matching games, win rewards, and become a master in the free number match puzzle. Scan the board as carefully as you can and customise the number blocks according to your preferences. You can change colours and numbers as you want. This numbers game is also known as Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla, 1010, Number match or Merge Numbers. Play matching games as long as you like and change the mode whenever you want.

Support
For help with translations, please send me an email.
descriptionShort: Find pairs and merge numbers to solve the addictive number match logic puzzle 2.

Challenge your brain with number match game Numberama 2! This ultimate number puzzle game offers endless fun and challenges. A game with simple rules, enriched with many new features.

Many of you know this Number Match logic riddle from school or university when you have played it with paper and pen. Now "Number Match Game Numberama 2" is also available for your smartphone. Matching brain games & logic puzzles for everyone.

HOW TO PLAY
In this numbers game you have to match and cross out numbers or digits on the playing field. Two numbers can be merged, if the numbers are the same, or add up to ten. For example you can combine numbers like 7 and 3, 9 and 1, or 6 and 6.
The two digits have to be side by side or on top of each other. The right side of the number board wraps around to the left side, so numbers on the right side are next to the numbers on the left, but one row down. The two numbers can have crossed-out number blocks between them.
If you cannot or do not want to merge numbers, and you do not want to use Boosts, you then press "Check". All the numbers remaining on the board are then copied after the existing numbers and the numbers game continues.

Number Match Game Numberama 2
There are three different modes:
- Level: Solve level after level with increasing difficulty
- Quick: The classic version of the numbers game with some features that speed up the number games
- Mode Builder: Create your own numbers game (1-18, 1-19, or choose from ten digits randomly)

Use all of this in any of your number match games:
- "Undo": Undo the last move
- "Help": Have a possible combination shown or get the info that there are no more number blocks that match
- "Cross": Strike through any single number
- "Statistics": Playing time and statistics for the current playing field are displayed
- Preview of next not crossed number blocks at top/bottom
- Diagonal numbers combinations in mode builder
- AutoClean: Empty lines are removed automatically
- Automatic save/load
- Highly customisable number board (change colours or numbers)
- Playable, without having to make in-app purchases
- No ads (if you want, you can watch ads to get coins)
- Minimum required permissions
- Google Play Games Services for leaderboards, achievements and saved games

Pair Matching Numbers Puzzle
Use your number games skills to find the matching pair combinations and solve the free logic puzzle. When the levels get difficult, you can also use special boosts to make the matching games even more interesting:
- Shuffle all the numbers on the numbers board
- Clear 30% of all crossed out numbers
- Clear all crossed out numbers on the number board

Are you looking for a number game that will save you from boredom? How about playing a logic block puzzle that will help you sharpen your number and matching games skills? With this pair matching number games app, you can experience a relaxing and addictive number puzzle with simple rules. Find and merge matching numbers that are the same or add up to ten on the number board. Switch between different puzzle modes and use new special features. Use your number match and block puzzle skills to merge and strike through all number blocks and clear the board. It is simple and addictive and therefore a great alternative to the well-known word or number games like math Sudoku, Solitaire, Nonogram, 2048, or other puzzle games. It is a real time killer and good brain game.

Solve number matching games, win rewards, and become a master in the free number match puzzle. An addictive logic puzzle game. Scan the board as carefully as you can and customise the number blocks according to your preferences. You can change colours and numbers as you want. This numbers game is also known as Take Ten, Match 10 Seeds, 1-19 game, Numberzilla, 1010, Number match or Merge Numbers. Play matching games as long as you like and change the mode whenever you want.

Support
For help with translations, please send me an email.
